thread.title: Italian model has enticing offer for man with world’s first ‘bionic penis’
thread.title_full: Italian model has enticing offer for man with world’s first ‘bionic penis’

author: Alex
title: Italian model has enticing offer for man with world’s first ‘bionic penis’
text:
model who made headlines earlier this year for offering to blow anyone who voted “no” on a referendum in Italy is stepping away from her political career to travel the U.K. And while she’s there, she wants to give a nice friendly mouth hug to the world’s first bionic dick. 
Paolo Saulino claims to have blown over 400 men during her last stunt (her campaign worked, by the way, as the majority of Italians voted “no” on a change to the constitution). Now she wants to suck off Mohammad Abad, the proud owner of the world’s first “bionic penis.” 2 
Abad, 44, lost his genitals in a car accident at the age of six when he was dragged six meters. But thanks to modern technology, Abad broke in his shiny new dick earlier this year with sex worker Charlotte Rose. The session reportedly lasted two hours. 3 
“I think it would be great if I could put my skills to use on him,” Paola told The Star. “I have never seen a bionic penis before. Maybe it will be bigger and better than a normal penis.” 4 
Abad has heard her request and says he would like to meet her, too. I do hope the two of them hit it off. 5 
While he gets lots of requests from women, Abad says that work has made it difficult to capitalize. 
“I get a lot of messages from women online who ask me if I will have sex with them.” he said. “They’ve heard about my bionic penis and they want to try it out. They are all very intrigued and think I can make love for hours.” 
The dick works by pressing a button inside the balls, which then fills the shaft with fluid from the stomach. A separate button deflates it. Advertisement Advertisement 6 
Really happy for my man Abad. Look at that smile. The dude is crushing it. Word got out that he lays pipe like a beast and now everyone wants a piece of that Terminator Twinkie. And if anyone deserves it, it’s him. He’s humble. He works too hard. And on top of that, the dude lost his dick when he was fucking dragged by a moving vehicle. GOOD. GOD. He deserves all of the bionic dicks and a team of models to keep them serviced. 
I hope this technology takes off. Me and my little guy will be the first in line. Imagine a future where everyone has a tricked out bionic dick. Guys will sit around with their bros, wangs out, talking about the specs like it’s a motorcycle. “Check it, just got mine fitted with dual suspension… new high performance carb… baby PURRS.” Xzibit will have a reality show where he installs subwoofers and TVs and fish tanks in poor people’s dicks. Pimp My Dick , obviously. Yeah. That’s the America I want for my grandchildren.
